content:
Is it possible to use _include to include resources referenced by an extension?
Ex: /ImplementationGuide?_id=XXX&_include=ImplementationGuide.extension
I'm thinking not, since "extension" is not a search parameter on IG... But, would like confirmation.
you can if you define a search parameter for it, and implement that
no you need to do some coding in HAPI to make it actually fucntion
yah.. guessed that was the case. but thanks for confirming

@Sean McIlvenna HAPI supports custom search parameters, and includes work on them.

I wrote up a blog post on this a while back: https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/blog/20170208_custom_search_parameters
Good to know! Thanks @James Agnew
